column3:
始まりの台地から出でし時…

一撃の剣は回生の祠に戻り
試練は中断される…
column4:
Should you leave the Great Plateau...


the One-Hit Obliterator will return to
the Shrine of Resurrection, and the trial
will await your return.

column3:
試練に再び挑むならば
回生の祠を訪れよ
column4:
If you wish to chance the trial again,
return to the Shrine of Resurrection.
